headline.main: Our Far Eastern Status; Chance Seen for a Settlement by Us Between China and Japan

lead_paragraph: TO THE EDITOR OF THE NEW YORK TIMES: Like some of your correspondents, I have been puzzled by the negotiations which it is reported are now being carried on between Japan and the United States. It is to be hoped that these negotiations look, not toward a temporary modus vivendi, but toward a definite settlement of the conflict in the Far East.
